scenario_name: Return to In the Clutches of Chaos
full_name: Scenario VII: Return to In the Clutches of Chaos

steps.text: Choose at random one of the three copies of each of the following locations: French Hill, Rivertown, Southside, South Church, and Merchant District. Place each of these locations into play and remove the other copies from the game. Each investigator begins play in Southside.
